entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , New Carlisle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: New Carlisle 5:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -12.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -15.3°C
Wind: ENE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Local blowing snow late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
